comments.body: This is a parity issue. iOS has a {{zoom()}} method, but Android does not. The map module's docs are wrong. The only way to zoom on both platforms is via the {{setLocation()}} method.
[~jquick]: can you kindly review this PR: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.map/pull/291

Verified on below environment:
*Mac OS X*= 10.15
*Node.js Version* = 12.16.0
*CLI Version* = 5.2.2
*SDK Version* = 9.1.0.v20200514121733
*ti.map version* = 5.0.2 (Android)
*Emulator*: Nexus6_API27 (SDK API: 29)

Working fine so closing this ticket. (Attached log and screenshots for reference)
And merging above PR to master
